typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01CareerStage
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01Employee
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01EmployeePosition
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01OrgBusiness
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01Person
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01PersonCareerStage
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HC01ReportsToHierarchyTree
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> HCH01JobFunction
HC01CareerStage select(mapColumn(
		CareerStageNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HC01PersonCareerStageProjection
HC01Employee select(mapColumn(
		CareerStageName,
		CareerStageNumber
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> HC01CareerStageProjection
HC01PersonCareerStageProjection, HC01CareerStageProjection join(HC01PersonCareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber == HC01CareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinedStream
JoinedStream aggregate(groupBy(CareerStageName = CareerStageName),
	Count = countDistinct(HC01PersonCareerStageProjection@CareerStageNumber)) ~> Metrics
Metrics sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		CareerStageName,
		Count
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Output
